summary: Four individuals sign up for a psychological research study only to discover that they are now subjects of a brutal, classified government program.
cast: Nick Cannon|Clea DuVall|Timothy Hutton|Chloë Sevigny|Peter Stormare|Shea Whigham|Anoop Kaur Sikand|Bill Stinchcomb|Meade Patton|Luke Sexton|Tim J. Smith|Michael Byrnes|Gus Krieger|Eddie Armes|Gregory Gast|Joan Roberts
title: The Killing Room
